mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecm_mzf_agent_water ( agent_id, agent_water_id, code, money, agent_water_time, score, phone, type, agent_rate, rec_no ) VALUES ( #{agentId}, #{agentWaterId}, #{code}, #{money}, #{agentWaterTime}, #{score}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{agentRate}, #{recNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ecm_mzf_agent_water SET score_status = 1 WHERE agent_id = #{id} AND code = #{code} AND score = #{score}
mapper.select: SELECT agent_water_id agentWaterId, code, money, agentWaterTime, score, score_status scoreStatus, phone, TYPE, agent_rate agentRate FROM ecm_mzf_agent_water WHERE code = #{code}

SELECT b.id, b.agent_id agentId, b.agent_water_id agentWaterId, b.code, b.money, b.agent_water_time agentWaterTime, b.score, b.score_status scoreStatus, b.phone, b.type, b.agent_rate agentRate FROM ecm_mzf_agent_water b WHERE b.score = 0 AND b.agent_id = #{id}

SELECT b.id, b.agent_id agentId, b.agent_water_id agentWaterId, b.code, b.money, b.agent_water_time agentWaterTime, b.score, b.score_status scoreStatus, b.phone, b.type, b.agent_rate agentRate FROM ecm_mzf_agent_water b WHERE b.score != 0 AND b.score_status = 0
SELECT a.* FROM ecm_mzf_agent_water a LEFT JOIN ecm_mzf_water b ON a.agent_water_id = b.ext_id WHERE a.agent_id = #{id} AND a.rec_no = #{recNo}
